venue.name: Half Moon Coffee and Grille Cafe

item.description:
Lets Break bread together and say goodbye to the winter blues and hello to the sweet days of spring. I am eager to hear your ideas's for up coming events and the Half Moon Cafe is a perfect place to meet. "You can BYOB which is always nice, and they don't charge a corking fee. They even bring out glasses and will kindly open the bottle for you without prompting."

The menu includes, pasta, pannini's, pizza and salads, plus their specials change daily.
The food is great!!


"Bon Appetit"
Denise

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "BYO WINE" AT THE HALF MOON CAFE
